title: Katgut Fanart - Kalista, Yorick and Shaco
body:
Hi dudes and dudettes, awesome to see these boards open up. Here's a few pieces of my own art I wanted to share. 
The Kalista is the most recent - I painted it up real quick when she was announced. So damn hyped!
I've drawn a ton of League fan art over the years, fivetinsoldiers is my username on tumblr/deviantART if there was any confusion. 

Anyway, cheers for looking!

replies.body: Great to see your art here on the Boards. I've followed you on Tumblr for awhile and you draw some awesome art.
I really appreciate that buddy, thanks so much for sticking with me!
You're welcome :)
They should make that shaco art the official cover to asylum shaco, its so beautiful I cri everyteim
wow this is amazing, just wondering what did you use to draw thus cause they look epic :D btw you are a amazing artist
Thanks Shaky! I painted these in Photoshop using my trusty old Wacom Bamboo Fun.

you have to put up a vide some where on how to create and draw like you do, i want to get into drawing champs, I'm very willing to learn your ways {{champion:11}} also another quick question, do you use a pad to draw into the computer, or a mouse? what equipment would you be using?
you have to put up a vide some where on how to create and draw like you do, i want to get into drawing champs, I'm very willing to learn your ways {{champion:11}}
Who is yoricks grillfren?
That Yorick is SO CUTE.
NICE, I can't even tell a diffrence from the real skin of shaco and you art work! Thumps up!{{champion:35}}
These are SO COOL. I love the perspective in the Shaco piece!
Thanks Achenar, I'm really glad you like it.

Gj on the fan art!

Love it.{{champion:83}} {{champion:35}} {{item:3151}}
Thanks! {{champion:429}}
This is so cool!! How long did they take?
Thank you! The Shaco and Yorick took about 6 hours each? They're a little older so I'm not too sure on that. The Kalista took 1.5 hours.
Loving the Yorick fanart, please do more champions!
Thanks Zastarx! I definitely have more champ pieces on the way. :)
The Yorick one is epic, would like to see a pic of Shaco & Teemo enjoying some shrooms in the top lane!
Beautiful!!!

This is awesome. Good work!!!

-ToxicHawk
Love the Yorick one and the style of the Kalista one, oh and the time it mustve taken to do the shaco one! Great work!
